title: Av-Innovate website
subtitle: company website for an emerging aviation advisory service
description: I developed this WordPress website for an emerging aviation consulting company. Using Divi, I implemented a Figma design and integrated Google Analytics. I optimized it for performance, accessibility, and SEO. The project successfully enhanced brand awareness and engagement.

title: JavaScript Basics Tutorial
subtitle: An interactive website that teaches basic JavaScript Concepts
description: I built this project in July 2021 in my early years of programming in JavaScript. It was a great way to reinforce the programming concepts I had learned. The tutorial app includes interactive exercises for beginners who are learning to code. Looking back at this project makes me feel proud of how far I've come in my journey as a Software Developer
